data.eml:eml: A reevaluation of the specimens of Mesocoelium (Trematoda: Mesocoeliidae) in the Colección Nacional de Helmintos, Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article López-García, Ashley Samara, García-Prieto, Luis (2017): A reevaluation of the specimens of Mesocoelium (Trematoda: Mesocoeliidae) in the Colección Nacional de Helmintos, Mexico. Zootaxa 4273 (2): 151-176, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4273.2.1
